goal: Check my GoCalendar for an event titled 'Our Anniversary' in October. Use those dates to find and book a King Suite at a Marrisuite in Miami, FL. After booking, please update the original 'Our Anniversary' calendar event by adding the hotel's name and booking confirmation number to the event notes.

evals.description: Verify that a hotel booking was successfully created in the Marrisuite application.
